attributes.action: Enforcement of the use of car indicators
attributes.additional_details:
As a regular driver on British roads, I am noticing an increasing trend of people failing to use their indicators when performing manoeuvres on British roads. This is dangerous and increases the likelihood of accidents being caused, particularly on motorways and roundabouts.

This petition requests an education campaign by the government to point out the dangers of not indicating, a clarification of the penalties for this action, followed by a campaign of enforcement by the police.
